item.title: How can I create a bot for social media networks
item.dc:creator: Proclus
item.description:
I would recommend you learn something like python,
automatetheboringstuff.com this is a good resource for learning it and for a basic understanding of how bots work. Later you can structure your bot as you like hope this helps.
